scripts.build: cat web/src/entitas/Exception.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IComponent.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IMatcher.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/ISystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IExecuteSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IInitializeSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/Matcher.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/MatcherInterfaces.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/TriggerOnEvent.js LF web/src/entitas/Entity.js LF web/src/entitas/Group.js LF web/src/entitas/GroupObserver.js LF web/src/entitas/Pool.js LF web/src/entitas/ReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/Systems.js LF web/src/example/generated.js LF web/src/example/extensions.js LF web/src/example/systems/AccelerateSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/DestroySystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/InputSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/MoveSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/ReachedFinishSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/RenderPositionSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreateFinishLineSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreateOpponentsSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreatePlayerSystem.js LF web/src/example/GameController.js > build/entitas.js  && cat web/src/entitas/Exception.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IComponent.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IMatcher.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/ISystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IExecuteSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IInitializeSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/Matcher.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/MatcherInterfaces.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/TriggerOnEvent.js LF web/src/entitas/Entity.js LF web/src/entitas/Group.js LF web/src/entitas/GroupObserver.js LF web/src/entitas/Pool.js LF web/src/entitas/ReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/Systems.js LF web/src/example/generated.js LF web/src/example/extensions.js LF web/src/example/systems/AccelerateSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/DestroySystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/InputSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/MoveSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/ReachedFinishSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/RenderPositionSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreateFinishLineSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreateOpponentsSystem.js LF web/src/example/systems/CreatePlayerSystem.js LF web/src/example/GameController.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/entitas.min,js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
